title: Dermatology Pop Quiz
summary:
Key ideas
- Scott presents three statements in a Two Truths and a Lie game related to dermatology.
- The game involves choosing which two statements are true and providing explanations.
- The answers will be provided in a later post.

Key learnings
- Skin cancer is a common dermatological issue in Americans.
- Acne in childhood may have an effect on lifespan, according to one of the statements.
- Botox may have potential as a treatment for depression, according to one of the statements.

Key questions
- Which statement is the lie?
- How does skin cancer develop?
- What is the mechanism behind Botox's potential efficacy as a treatment for depression?
